original_title: The United States vs. Billie Holiday Special: Lee Daniels and Cast Interviewed by Oprah Winfrey
overview: A conversation moderated by Oprah Winfrey with Lee Daniels, Andra Day, Trevante Rhodes, and Susan-Lori Parks takes a peek behind the curtains of the new Hulu Original Film, The United States vs. Billie Holiday. Watch how the film unapologetically presents the iconâ€™s Incredibles and tragic life
title: The United States vs. Billie Holiday Special: Lee Daniels and Cast Interviewed by Oprah Winfrey
